short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert keyword lists into different match types.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your keyword lists effortlessly with the Keyword Match Type Converter. This user-friendly Chrome extension allows you to easily switch between exact, phrase, and broad match types for your keywords. Simply input your list of keywords, select the desired match type, and the extension will convert them instantly. It ensures that if a keyword already has a match type, it’s replaced—never stacked—ensuring clean and accurate formatting every time. Plus, your keywords are saved automatically, so you can pick up right where you left off. Copy your results with a single click, making keyword management a breeze!
